posts.raw_content:
The idea that we are supposed to fall back and shut up because Trump expressed distaste for us bringing up the Epstein stuff is bullshit, but a bunch of people are doing it.  All the boomers on Facebook are like "Yes sir! We don't know the full story. We have faith in the man who took a bullet for us!" That's called a Messiah Complex.

He is not above reproach.  

He straight up called us selfish and lied about this. Period. You want to know what I think? He made some negotiations with high power people, so he’s not going to out them.

Do you know what the end result of that is? In 3 more years he’s out of office, and the same disgusting pedos who run the world will see ZERO justice. You know why? Because he’s more concerned with the perception of “winning” and if he digs into this, he’s stirring the pot on his “perfect” administration as he called it.

Wake up. When he’s gone, the same group of elites will still be abusing kids.

I'm not saying there aren't other things being done that are useful.  But at the expense of letting the worst of the worst remain in power? Nope.  PUBLIC TRIALS AND FULL DISCLOSURE.

And people saying “We don’t know the full story” will be at fault when he runs out of time and doesn't touch this at all, before leaving office.

But it was a Mossad operation and Trump is beholden to the government of Israel, and there’s your real answer for why we will get nothing .

He could have buried this in any manner, but he chose to INSULT US while doing it. 

And many low-info boomers eat it up.  Even something as terrible as a PROVEN grotesque misuse of justice, which was Epstein all the way back to the early 2000s, and here we are in 2025 with Trump saying “It was just the Democrats” and “We are still talking about this guy?” Yes we are, because a bunch of child abusers are still out there RUNNING OUR COUNTRY AND INSTITUTIONS

I don’t want them made into “leverage” so that when he’s out in 3 years they just ride off into the sunset.

Maybe you need to educate YOURSELF on the Epstein cases.
As for the Covid thing, after it had been proven that the vaccines didn't work and people were dying, Trump was still shilling for it because it made him look like he won with the left. People boo'd him at his rallies, and rightfully so. Eventually he dropped it. Being loud works. He works for us.

Some of these people even tried to use Alan Dershowitz as proof "He said there's no list."  MOTHERFUCKER HE WAS DEFENDING EPSTEIN IN COURT. What do you think he's going to say?

This just proves to me that when the AntiChrist comes, as long as he wins people’s affections, they will follow him, even to the point of not prosecuting child rapists. Because “they don’t know the story” but they have “faith”.

Narrow is the way. Blind faith for this man is no different than the people with the Ukraine profile pics, BLM, Covid masks, and whatever other idol they have made on this earth.

I’ve said my peace. Hopefully someone heeds my warning.

If Trump doesn't reverse course on this fast, I'm out.

posts.raw_content:
The solution is simple if Trump thinks that prior administrations intentionally botched the case and planted evidence then you just order your FBI to reopen the case and start the investigation from scratch, Pam Bondi claimed there are over 250 victims, the FBI needs to locate all of these victims, interview these victims to find out what happened to them, where it happened and who did it, they then take sworn statements from these victims and the investigation begins, this needs to be done. And investigate the administrations who botched the files/evidence. 

Dont just tell people to “forget about it” and “move on.” Its just so strange to me how Trump and many in his admin (Bongino, Kash, etc.) made such a huge deal over Epstein, said it was being used as a blackmail operation to strenghen the deep state,  and promised to expose it and go after those involved. To suddenly desperately trying to get people to shut up about it saying theres no files, Epstein really killed himself, no one else was involved. Very strange. It feels like I’m being gaslighted.

posts.title: It’s disturbing to see how easily emotions can be manipulated.

twitter.content:
We are in an information/psychological war, and it’s disturbing to see how easily emotions can be manipulated.

All it takes is a couple anonymously sourced rumors, a few gullible clickbait influencers, some bots to amplify the message, and the panic spreads like wildfire.
